scripts.test: echo please open test/index.html in browser to run tests
scripts.test:unit: echo please open test/index.html in browser to run tests
scripts.test:integ: echo integration tests are disabled in this repo
scripts.cover: echo please open test/index.html in browser to run tests
scripts.cover:unit: echo please open test/index.html in browser to run tests
scripts.cover:integ: echo please open test/index.html in browser to run tests
scripts.minify: echo creating minified package dist/analytics.min.js && mkdir -p dist && uglifyjs src/analytics.js --compress --mangle -o dist/analytics.min.js -c -m --source-map "root='src/analytics.js',url='analytics.min.js.map'"
scripts.release: npm run patchVersion && npm run minify
